Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

upgrade-screenbuilder


This command is deprecated and will be removed in the next official release.

Usage Synopsis
General $ appbuilder upgrade-screenbuilder

Upgrades a project to the latest Screen Builder version. This operation regenerates the project and you might lose custom code changes. For more information how to preserve your custom code changes, see How To Add And Keep Custom Code Changes In Your App.

Command Limitations

  • You can run this command only on Apache Cordova projects created with Screen Builder 0.0.7 and later. For projects created with earlier versions of Screen Builder, you need to upgrade your project manually. You need to create a new Screen Builder project and transfer custom code and resources to the newly created project.

Related Commands

Command Description
create screenbuilder Creates a new project for hybrid development with Screen Builder.
screenbuilder Shows all commands for project development with Screen Builder.
add-about Inserts an about form in an existing application view.
add-authentication Inserts sign-in and sign-up forms in an existing application view.
add-dataprovider Connects your project to a data provider.
add-field Inserts an input field in an existing form.
add-form Inserts a generic input form in an existing application view.
add-list Inserts a list in an existing application view.
